testcase.classname: Validation of Ind Digi Agri Jewel Loan
testcase.name: Authentication Stage
testcase.system-out: Given User have to launch the URL...........................................passed When User have to enter valid CIF/SB Accountnumber..........................passed And User have to click validate button......................................passed And User have to click sendotp button.......................................passed And User have to enter valid OTP............................................passed And User have to click submitotp button.....................................passed And User should navigate to customerdetails page............................passed And User should check the purpose of loan is always agri and non editable...passed And User should enter valid email address and click generate otp and enter valid otp and click submit otp button.passed And User should select Religion-caste.......................................passed And User should click radio button of permananent address and user should check permananent address and temporary address are same.passed And User should add nominee details.........................................passed And User should enter next button...........................................passed And User should navigate to activity details................................passed And User have to fill the loan amount and gross weight......................passed And User have to fill the crop details and agri allied deatils..............passed And User have to enter the Value in Loan Amount Repaid to Non-Institutional Lender and if enter more than amount user have to check the alert is coming.passed And User should navigate to branch selection page...........................passed And User have to select branch..............................................passed And User have to select appoinmentdate......................................passed And User should navigate to preview page....................................passed And User have to check all the textboxes having values or not...............passed And User have to click next button..........................................passed And User should navigate to branch verification page........................passed
